content: "A machine to read the mind came a step closer on Thursday, when scientists at University College London released the results of an experiment in which brain scans revealed the location of people moving around a virtual reality environment." I saw this demonstrated a couple of months back on a news show. Even our thoughts are going to be raided and held captive. I can see it in the furture. "Your are hereby charged you with 'thought of robbery', anything you say or think, can and will be held against you in a court of law...." "http://www.ft.com/cms/s/0/6652c3cc-0f27-11de-ba10-0000779fd2ac.html"

content: Remember when they were doing mental telegraphy on the Rooskies? Problem was, that funny alphabet fogged the lines of communication. Think not being able to understand a foreign language would be a problem to the clairvoyant? Geez there's a couple of states full of folk weho 'speak in tongues' ... get them in there.
